title: Apple stuffed chicken breast
ingredients: ['2 (100g) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '2 small apples, thinly sliced or coarsely shredded', '2 tablespoons grated mild Cheddar cheese', '1 tablespoon breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon butter', '60ml (2 fl oz) dry white wine', '60ml (2 fl oz) water', '1 tablespoon water', '1 1/2 teaspoons cornflour', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley to garnish']
